.. django-frontend-skeleton documentation master file, created by
   sphinx-quickstart on Fri Dec 21 10:18:08 2012.
   You can adapt this file completely to your liking, but it should at least
   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Django Frontend Skeleton documentation
======================================

Django Frontend Skeleton is a basic Django template skeleton built on HTML5 Boilerplate and Twitter Bootstrap.

Starring
---------
* `HTML5 Boilerplate <https://github.com/h5bp/html5-boilerplate>`_
    - `Modernizr <https://github.com/Modernizr/Modernizr>`_
* `Twitter Bootstrap <https://github.com/twitter/bootstrap>`_
* `jQuery <https://github.com/jquery/jquery>`_
* `iOS-Orientationchange-Fix <https://github.com/scottjehl/iOS-Orientationchange-Fix>`_


Contents
---------

   :maxdepth: 2
   
   getting_started
   template_tags
   license
